snippet: Amplify, the education division of Rupert Murdoch’s company, is in an “advanced stage of negotiations” with a potential buyer.
abstract: News Corporation says it will take $371 million write-down on its Amplify education division; will wind down production of child-oriented tablets, a key part of service, and is in talks with potential buyer for remaining components of initiative.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: Amplify, the education division of Rupert Murdoch’s company, is in an “advanced stage of negotiations” with a potential buyer.

headline.main: News Corp. Planning to Sell Off Money-Losing Education Unit
headline.print_headline: News Corp. Taking a $371 Million Write-Down on Its Education Unit
